Text.val: 07.07.2005 EE SCR#8652 erased update for Buying group
@ Part of previous ODC203, which perfoms database updates, see SCR 5825

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Buying group with debtornumber (heller)')&' '&Trim (Str ({2,10},'9'))&' '&MlsTrans ('does not exist')
MlsTrans ('Buying group with debtornumber (heller)')&' '&Trim (Str ({2,10},'9'))&' '&MlsTrans ('exist, updated DEBH_ISBUYINGGROUP = "Y"')
MlsTrans ('No buying group for this client with debtornumber (heller)')&' '&Trim (Str ({2,10},'9'))
MlsTrans ('Buying group with debtornumber (heller)')&' '&Trim (Str ({0,1},'9'))&' '&MlsTrans ('exist, updated DEBH_ISBUYINGGROUP = "Y"')

Text.val: ... update T203 fields to inform users about database updates
... update T203 fields to inform users about database updates
... only if all T203 rows were handeld
